doc:
Gordon Douglas (director) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gordon_Douglas_(director) 0 Gordon Douglas (December 15, 1907 – September 29, 1993) was an American film director, who directed many different genres of films over the course of a five-decade career in motion pictures. He was a native of New York City. Gordon_Douglas ( December_15_,_1907 – September_29_,_1993 ) was an_American_film_director , who directed many_different_genres of films over the_course of a_five-decade_career in motion_pictures . He was a_native of New_York_City .
